runAtEndOfTurn

public void runAtEndOfTurn()
Code to run once per turn, at the very end

walkAimlessly

public void walkAimlessly()
Causes this Robot to walk around without direction, turning left or right at random when an obstacle is encountered. runAtEndOfTurn is called after the move is chosen.

randomWalk

public void randomWalk()
Similar to walk aimlessly, except that this robot will perform a random walk. runAtEndOfTurn is called after the move is chosen.

broadcastMessage

public void broadcastMessage()
Broadcast a random message.

findAFriendly

public battlecode.common.Robot findAFriendly()
Returns:
the Robot closest to this Robot that is on the same team as this.

findAWeakFriendly

public battlecode.common.Robot findAWeakFriendly()
Finds the friendly nearby that has the lowest flux and is not an archon. This is useful for archons that need to resupply friendlies. Since flux transfers can only occur with adjacent robots or robots on the same location, this method will only return a robot in one of those acceptable receiving locations.

Returns:
a robot that is friendly adjacent with low flux count. null if there is no nearby robot.

findALowEnergonFriendly

public battlecode.common.Robot findALowEnergonFriendly()
Finds the friendly nearby that has the lowest energon and is not an archon. This is useful for scouts that need to heal neighbors. Since the heal range is exactly the attack range, only considers robots within the attack range.

Returns:
a robot that is friendly nearby with low energon count. null if there is no nearby robot.

acceptableFluxTransferLocation

public boolean acceptableFluxTransferLocation(battlecode.common.MapLocation attempt)
Boolean valued function that determines whether a location is valid (adjacent or equal to this location) for a flux transfer.

Parameters:
attempt - MapLocation to test the validity of
Returns:
true when attempt is equal to or adjacent to this robot's location

goCloser

@Deprecated
public void goCloser(battlecode.common.MapLocation target)
Deprecated. This method is replaced by bugNav

This is an archaic navigation method that is superceeded by Navigation.

Parameters:
target - Target location to got closer to
